name: The First Organization
description: Have two ships in your main fleet.

name: Organize the 6th Destroyer Division
description: Have ONLY Akatsuki, Hibiki, Ikazuchi and Inazuma in your Second Fleet.

name: Organize a Carrier Task Force in your Second Fleet
jp: 第2艦隊で空母機動部隊を編成せよ！
description: Have a CV(L) and 3 DDs in your Second Fleet.

name: Organize a Carrier Task Force
description: Have a CV(L) and 3 DDs in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the Main Fleet with a Battleship and Heavy Cruisers
jp: 戦艦と重巡による主力艦隊を編成せよ！
description: Have a BB and 2 CAs in your Main Fleet (BBVs don't count).

name: Organize the 3 Sendai class Light Cruisers
jp: 「川内」型軽巡姉妹の全3艦を編成せよ！
description: Have Sendai, Jintsuu and Naka in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the 4 Myoukou class Heavy Cruisers
jp: 「妙高」型重巡姉妹の全4隻を編成せよ！
description: Have Myoukou, Nachi, Ashigara and Haguro in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize a Fast Battleship Force with the Kongou class
jp: 「金剛」型による高速戦艦部隊を編成せよ！
description: Have Kongou, Hiei, Haruna and Kirishima in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the two Fusou class Battleships
jp: 「扶桑」型戦艦姉妹の全2隻を編成せよ！
description: Have Fusou and Yamashiro in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the two Ise class Battleships
jp: 「伊勢」型戦艦姉妹の全2隻を編成せよ！
description: Have Ise and Hyuuga in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the Nagumo Carrier Task Force
description: Have ONLY Akagi, Kaga, Hiryuu and Souryuu in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize a Destroyer Division
description: Have 4 DDs in your fleet.

name: Organize the Mikawa Fleet
description: Have Choukai, Aoba, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu and one FAST ship in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the 4th Cruiser Division
description: Have Takao, Atago, Choukai and Maya in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the Nishimura Fleet
description: Have Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami and Shigure in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the 5th Carrier Division
description: Have Shoukaku, Zuikaku and 2 DDs in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the New Mikawa Fleet
jp: 新「三川艦隊」を編成せよ！
description: Have Choukai, Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka and Tenryuu in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize a Submarine Fleet
description: Have 2 SS in a fleet.

jp: 航空水上打撃艦隊を編成せよ！
name: Organize an Aviation Surface Attack Fleet
description: Have ONLY 2 BBV and 2 CAV in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize a Medium-sized Submarine Fleet
jp: 中規模潜水艦隊を編成せよ！
description: Have 3 SS in a fleet.

name: Organize the 6th Cruiser Division
description: Have Furutaka, Kako, Kinugasa and Aoba in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the 5th Fleet
description: Have Nachi, Ashigara, Tama and Kiso in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize a Torpedo Squadron!
description: Have a fleet with a CL flagship and 3 DDs.

name: Organize the 1st Torpedo Squadron
description: Have Abukuma, Akebono, Ushio, Kasumi and Shiranui in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the 8th Destroyer Division
description: Have ONLY Asashio, Michishio, Ooshio and Arashio in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the 18th Destroyer Division
description: Have ONLY Kasume, Arare, Kagerou and Shiranui in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the 30th Destroyer Division (First Generation)
jp: 「第三十駆逐隊（第一次）」を編成せよ！
description: Have ONLY Mutsuki, Kisaragi, Yayoi and Mochizuki in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the 30th Destroyer Division (Second Generation)
jp: 「第三十駆逐隊(第二次)」を編成せよ！
description: Have ONLY Mutsuki, Yayoi, Uzuki and Mochizuki in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the 5th Cruiser Division
description: Have Myoukou, Nachi and Haguro in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the New 2nd Carrier Division
jp: 新編「第二航空戦隊」を編成せよ！
description: Have Hiryuu (K2, flagship), Souryuu and 2 DDs in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the Submarine Fleet: "6th Fleet"
jp: 潜水艦隊「第六艦隊」を編成せよ！
description: Have an AS (flagship) and 4+ SS in your Main Fleet.

name: Deploy the New Radar Type
description: Have Myoukou (K2, flagship) in a fleet.

name: Strengthen the Reorganized 2nd Carrier Division
jp: 再編成「第二航空戦隊」を強化せよ！
description: Have Souryuu (K2, flagship), Hiryuu (K2) and 2 DDs in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize a Fleet of 6 ships
description: Have 6 ships in your fleet.

name: Gather all of the Elite 3rd Battleship Division
jp: 精鋭「第三戦隊」全艦集結せよ！
description: Have Kongou (K2), Hiei (K2), Haruna (K2) and Kirishima (K2) in your Main Fleet.

name: Deploy the New Standard Aircraft Carrier Class
description: Have Unryuu as flagship in a fleet.

name: Organize the Main Battleship Force: "The 2nd Squadron"
jp: 主力戦艦部隊「第二戦隊」を編成せよ！
description: Have Nagato, Mutsu, Fusou and Yamashiro in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize a Surface Attack Fleet with Battleships Comprising the Main Force
jp: 戦艦を主力とした水上打撃部隊を編成せよ！
description: Have 3 ships from the Nagato, Ise, Fusou or Yamato class, plus 1 CL in your Main Fleet.

name: Reorganize the Nishimura Fleet
description: Have Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure and Michishio in your Main Fleet.

name: Prepare the Improvement Arsenal
description: Have Akashi as flagship in your main fleet.

name: Organize a Light Surface Counterattack Fleet
jp: 軽快な「水上反撃部隊」を編成せよ！
description: Have Kasumi (flagship), Ashigara, 1 CL and 3 DDs in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the 11th Destroyer Division
description: Have ONLY Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki and Murakumo in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the 21st Destroyer Division
description: Have ONLY Hatsuharu, Hatsushimo, Nenohi and Wakaba in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the 22nd Destroyer Division
description: Have ONLY Satsuki, Fumizuki, Nagatsuki and 1 more DD in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize a Fleet of 2 Light Cruisers
jp: 軽巡2隻を擁する隊を編成せよ！
description: Have 2 CL in a fleet.

name: Reorganize the Mikawa Fleet and prepare to rush in
jp: 「三川艦隊」を新編、突入準備せよ！
description: Have a fleet with Choukai (K2, flagship) and 5 of the following: Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa, Yuubari, Tenryuu.

name: Reorganize the 18th Squadron
description: Have Tenryuu, Tatsuta and at least 2 other ships in your fleet.

name: Organize the Marine Rush Fleet
jp: 海上突入部隊を編成せよ！
description: Have Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi and Inazuma in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the New 6th Destroyer Division
jp: 新編「第六駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
description: Have Akatsuki (K2, flagship), Hibiki/Verniy, Ikazuchi and Inazuma in your Main Fleet.

name: 1st Torpedo Squadron, prepare for a rush to the Norther Sea
jp: 「第一水雷戦隊」北方突入準備！
description: Have Abukuma (flagship), Hibiki/Verniy, Hatsushimo, Wakaba, Samidare and Shimakaze in your Main Fleet.

name: 1st Torpedo Squadron, Prepare for another Rush to the Northern Sea
jp: 「第一水雷戦隊」北方再突入準備！
description: Have Abukuma (K2, flagship), Hibiki/Verniy, Yuugumo, Naganami, Akigumo and Shimakaze in your Main Fleet.

name: Reorganize the 5th Carrier Division
jp: 「第五航空戦隊」を再編成せよ！
description: Have Shoukaku, Zuikaku, Oboro and Akigumo in your Main Fleet.

name: Prepare the New 21st Squadron for Sortie
jp: 新編「第二一戦隊」出撃準備！
description: Have Nachi (K2), Ashigara (K2), Tama and Kiso in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the 16th Squadron (First Generation)
jp: 第十六戦隊(第一次)」を編成せよ！
description: Have Ashigara (flagship), Kuma and Nagara in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the 3rd Carrier Division
description: Have Zuikaku (Kai, flagship), Zuihou, Chitose (CVL) and Chiyoda (CVL) in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the Second Fleet
description: Have a flagship in the Second Fleet.

name: Organize the 4th Carrier Division
description: Have Hyuuga (Kai) and Ise (Kai) in your main fleet.

name: Organize Ozawa's Fleet
description: Have Zuikaku (Kai, flagship), Zuihou (Kai), Chitose (CVL), Chiyoda (CVL), Ise (Kai) and Hyuuga (Kai) in your Main Fleet.

name: Organize the New Carrier Division
jp: 新航空戦隊を編成せよ！
description: Have Zuikaku (K2), Shoukaku (K2) and 2 DDs in your fleet.

name: Organize the 16th Squadron (Second Generation)
jp: 「第十六戦隊(第二次)」を編成せよ！
description: Have Natori (flagship), Isuzu and Kinu in your fleet.

name: Organize the New Carrier Divison
jp: 「新編成航空戦隊」を編成せよ！
description: Have 2 CV(L), 2 BBV/CAV and 2 DDs in your fleet.

name: Reorganize the Strengthened Surface Counterattack Fleet
jp: 精強な「水上反撃部隊」を再編成せよ！
description: Have Kasumi (flagship), Ashigara, Ooyodo, Asashimo and Kiyoshimo in your fleet.

name: Organize the 31st Division (First Generation)
jp: 「第三十一戦隊(第一次)」を編成せよ！
description: Have Isuzu (K2, flagship), Satsuki (K2) and Uzuki (Kai) in your fleet.

name: Organize the 27th Destroyer Division
description: Have ONLY Shiratsuyu (Kai, flagship), Shigure, Harusame and Samidare in your fleet.

jp: 強行高速輸送部隊を編成せよ！
name: Organize a Forced High-speed Transport Fleet
description: Have Sendai (K2, flag), Kawakaze (K2), Shigure (K2) and 2 DDs in your fleet.

jp: 新編「水雷戦隊」を含む艦隊を再編成せよ！
name: Organise a New Torpedo Squadron!
description: Have a CL/CLT/CT (flag) and 4 DD in your fleet.

name: Organize a Heavy Cruiser Division
description: Have 2 CA in a fleet (CAV don't count).

jp: 「天龍」型軽巡姉妹の全2艦を編成せよ！
name: Organize the two Tenryuu class Light Cruisers
description: Have Tenryuu and Tatsuta in your Main Fleet.

name: Deploy a Seaplane Tender
description: Have an AV in a fleet.

name: The First Sortie
description: Sortie your Main Fleet.

name: Sink an Enemy Carrier
description: Sink an enemy CV(L).

name: Sortie the Mikawa Fleet
description: Sortie Choukai, Aoba, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu and one FAST ship.

name: Sortie the 6th Destroyer Division
description: Sortie Akatsuki, Hibiki, Ikazuchi and Inazuma.

name: Sortie the 4th Cruiser Division
description: Sortie Takao, Atago, Maya, Choukai and 2 additional ships to 2-2 and defeat the boss.

name: Sortie the Nishimura Fleet
description: Sortie Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure and 2 addition ships to 2-3 and defeat the boss.

name: Sortie the 5th Carrier Divison
description: Sortie Shoukaku, Zuikaku and 4 additional ships to 3-1 and defeat the boss.

name: Sortie the New Mikawa Fleet
description: Sortie Choukai, Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa and Tenryuu to 2-3 and defeat the boss.

name: Sortie a Submarine Fleet
description: Sortie 2 SS and 4 additional ships to 2-3 and defeat the boss.

name: Sortie an Aviation Surface Attack Fleet
jp: 「航空水上打撃艦隊」出撃せよ！
description: Sortie 2 CAV, 2 BBV and 2 additional ships to 4-2 and defeat the boss.

name: Sortie the 6th Cruiser Division
description: Sortie Aoba, Furutaka, Kako, Kinugasa and two additional ships to 2-3 and S-rank the boss.

name: Guard the Sea in Front of the Naval Base
jp: 鎮守府正面海域を護れ！
description: Sortie to 1-1 and clear it.

name: Sortie the 8th Destroyer Division
description: Sortie Arashio, Asashio, Michishio, Ooshio and 2 other ships to 2-3 and defeat the boss.

name: Sortie the 18th Destroyer Division
description: Sortie Arare, Kagerou, Kasumi, Shiranui and 2 additional ships to 3-1 and defeat the boss.

name: Sortie the 30th Destroyer Division (First Generation)
jp: 「第三十駆逐隊(第一次)」出撃せよ！
description: Sortie Mutsuki, Kisaragi, Mochizuki, Yayoi and 2 DDs (or DD + CL flag) to 3-2 and get a C or better at the boss.

name: Sortie an Aviation Battleship
description: Sortie a fleet with at least 2 BBVs to 4-4 and defeat the boss.
Sortie Mutsuki, Mochizuki, Uzuki and Yayoi to 1-5 and get a C rank or better at the boss.
name: 30th Destroyer Division Anti-Submarine Patrol
Sortie the New 2nd Carrier Division
jp: 新編「第二航空戦隊」出撃せよ！
description: Sortie Hiryuu (K2, flagship), Souryuu (Kai/K2), 2 DDs and optionally other ships to 5-2 and S Rank the boss.

name: Sortie the Elite 2nd Carrier Division
jp: 精鋭「第二航空戦隊」抜錨せよ！
description: Sortie Souryuu (K2, flagship), Hiryuu (K2), 2 DDs and 2 additional ships to 4-3 and S-rank the boss.

name: Sortie the Battleship: "Haruna"
description: Sortie Haruna (K2) and 5 additional ships to 5-1 and S-rank the boss.

name: Sortie the 601st Naval Air Group
description: Sortie Unryuu (Kai) and 5 additional ships to 5-2 and S-rank the boss.

name: Sortie a Light Carrier Squadron
description: Sortie 1-2 CVLs, 1 CL and 3-4 DDs to 2-1 and S-rank the boss.

name: Sortie the 2nd Fleet
description: Sortie your Second Fleet.

name: Torpedo Squadron Bashi Island Emergency Deployment
jp: 「水雷戦隊」バシー島沖緊急展開
description: Sortie 1-2 CLs (flagship) and 4-5 DDs to 2-2 and S-rank the boss.

name: Sortie the 2nd Squadron
description: Sortie Fusou, Mutsu, Nagato, Yamashiro and 2 additional ships to 4-2 and S-rank the boss twice.

name: Rush the Battleship Force to the Northern Sea
jp: 「戦艦部隊」北方海域に突入せよ！
description: Sortie 2 BBs (not BBV), 1 CVL and 3 additional ships to 3-5 and S-rank the boss.

name: Advance the Nishumura Fleet to the Southern Sea
jp: 「西村艦隊」南方海域へ進出せよ！
description: Sortie Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure, Michishio and 1 additional ship to 5-1 and S-rank the boss.

name: Sortie the 6th Squadron to the Southwestern Sea
jp: 「第六戦隊」南西海域へ出撃せよ！
description: Sortie Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa and 2 additional ships to 2-5 and S-rank the boss.

name: Sortie the 11th Destroyer Division
jp: 「第十一駆逐隊」 出撃せよ！
description: Sortie Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki, Murakumo and 2 additional ships to 2-3 and defeat the boss.

name: The 11th Destroyer Division Anti-Submarine Patrol
description: Sortie Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki and Murakumo to 1-5 and get at least a C rank at the boss.

name: Sortie the 21st Destroyer Division
description: Sortie Hatsuharu, Nenohi, Wakaba, Hatsushimo and 2 additional ships to 3-1 and S-rank the boss.

name: Sortie the Nachi Squadron
description: Sortie Nachi (flagship), Hatsushimo, Kasumi, Ushio, Akebono and 1 other ship to 2-2 and S-rank the boss.

name: Sortie the 22nd Destroyer Division
description: Sortie Satsuki, Fumizuki, Nagatsuki, 1 DD and 2 additional ships to 1-4 and S-rank the boss.

name: Sortie to the Southwestern Archipelago Sea
jp: 南西諸島沖に出撃せよ！
description: Sortie to 1-2 and defeat the boss.

name: Sortie the Remodeled Anti-Air Heavy Cruiser
description: Sortie Maya (Kai/K2), 1CL, 2 DDs and up to 2 additional ships to 2-3 and S-rank the boss.

name: Sortie the New Mikawa Fleet to the Solomon Waters
jp: 新編「三川艦隊」ソロモン方面へ！
description: Sortie Choukai (K2, flagship) and a combination of Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa, Yuubari, Tenryuu to 5-1 and S-rank the boss.

name: The 6th Destroyer Division Anti-Submarine Patrol nanodesu
jp: 「第六駆逐隊」対潜哨戒なのです！
description: Sortie Akatsuki, Hibiki/Verniy, Ikazuchi and Inazuma to 1-5 and get a C or better at the boss.

name: 18th Squadron, Set Sail!
description: Sortie Tenryuu, Tatsuta and at least 2 wildcards to 2-3 and S-rank the boss.

name: Deploy the Marine Rush Fleet
jp: 海上突入部隊、進発せよ！
description: Sortie Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi and Inazuma to 5-1 and S-rank the boss.

name: A Thorough 6th Destroyer Division Anti-Submarine Patrol nanodesu
jp: 「第六駆逐隊」対潜哨戒を徹底なのです！
description: Sortie Akatsuki (K2), Hibiki, Ikazuchi and Inazuma to 1-5 and A-rank the boss.

name: Rush the 1st Torpedo Squadron to Operation Ke
jp: 「第一水雷戦隊」ケ号作戦、突入せよ！
description: Sortie Abukuma (flagship), Hibiki/Verniy, Hatsushimo, Wakaba, Samidare and Shimakaze to 3-2 and defeat the boss.

name: Rush the 1st Torpedo Squadron to Operation KE Again
jp: 「第一水雷戦隊」北方ケ号作戦、再突入！
description: Sortie Abukuma (K2, flagship), Hibiki, Yuugumo, Nanagami, Akigumo and Shimakaze to 3-2 and S-rank the boss.

name: Strengthen the Anti-Submarine Patrol in Front of the Naval Base
jp: 鎮守府正面の対潜哨戒を強化せよ！
description: Sortie to 1-5 and get 4 A-ranks at the boss.

name: "Carrier Task Force", advance to the Northern Sea
jp: 「空母機動部隊」北方海域に進出せよ！
description: Sortie a CV (flagship) to 3-5 and S-rank the boss.

name: Intercept the Approaching Enemy Vanguard Fleet
jp: 接近する「敵前衛艦隊」を迎撃せよ！
description: Sortie to 1-2 and clear it (again).

name: Sortie the 5th Carrier Division to the Southern Sea Coral Islands
jp: 「第五航空戦隊」珊瑚諸島沖に出撃せよ！
description: Sortie Shoukaku, Zuikaku, Oboro, Akigumo and up to 2 additional ships to 5-2 and S-rank the boss.

name: Sortie the New 21st Squadron to the North
jp: 新編「第二一戦隊」北方へ出撃せよ！
description: Sortie Nachi (K2), Ashigara (K2), Tama, Kiso and up to 2 additional ships to 3-1 and S-rank the boss.

name: Sortie the 16th Squadron (First Generation)
jp: 「第十六戦隊(第一次)」出撃せよ！
description: Sortie Ashigara (flagship), Kuma, Nagara and up to 3 wildcards to 2-2 and S-rank the boss.

name: 3rd Carrier Division: sortie to defend the Nansei Islands
jp: 「第三航空戦隊」南西諸島防衛線に出撃！
description: Sortie Zuikaki (Kai, flagship), Zuihou, Chitose (CVL) and Chiyoda (CVL) to 1-4 and S-rank the boss. Additional ships are allowed.

name: Sortie Ozawa's Fleet
description: Sortie Zuikaku (Kai, flaship), Zuihou (Kai), Chitose (CVL), Chiyoda (CVL), Ise (Kai) and Hyuuga (Kai) to 2-4 and S-rank the boss.

name: Sortie the 16th Squadron (Second Generation)
jp: 「第十六戦隊(第二次)」出撃せよ！
description: Sortie Natori (flagship), Isuzu, Kinu and up to 3 additional ships to 2-3 and get an S-rank at the boss.

name: Sortie the New Carrier Division to the North
jp: 新編成航空戦隊、北方へ進出せよ！
description: Sortie 2 CV(L), 2 BBV/CAV and 2 DDs to 3-3 and S-rank the boss.

name: Carry out Operation Rei-gou
description: Sortie Kasumi (flagship), Ashigara, Ooyodo, Asashimo, Kiyoshimo and up to 1 additional ship to 2-5 and S-rank the boss.

name: Send the Flagship "Kasumi" to Patrol the Northern Sea
jp: 旗艦「霞」北方海域を哨戒せよ！
description: Sortie Kasumi (K2, flagship), 3DDs and up to 2 additonal ships to 3-1 and defeat the boss.

name: Flagship "Kasumi", Sortieing! Destroy the Enemy Fleet!
jp: 旗艦「霞」出撃！敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
description: Sortie Kasumi (K2, flagship), 2 DDs and up to 3 additional ships to 2-5 and S-rank the boss.

name: Sortie a Torpedo Squadron
description: Sortie a CL (flagship) and 3 DDs.

name: Sortie the 31st Division
description: Sortie Isuzu (K2, flagship), Satsuki (K2), Uzuki (Kai) and up to 3 additional ships to 1-6 and reach the end.

name: Sortie the 27th Destroyer Division
description: Sortie Shiratsuyu (Kai, flagship), Shigure, Harusame, Samidare and up to 2 additional ships to 2-3 and S-rank the boss.

name: Bolster the Capability for Amphibious Assault Operations!
jp: 強襲上陸作戦用戦力を増強せよ！
description: Sortie to 6-3 and defeat the boss.

name: Defend the Oil Refinery Zone!
jp: 製油所地帯を防衛せよ！
description: Sortie 1 CL (flagship) and 5 DDs to 1-3 and S-rank the boss 3 times.

name: Reinforce the Southwestern Archipelago Defense Line
jp: 南西諸島防衛線を強化せよ！
description: Sortie to 1-4 and S-rank the boss 5 times.
Sortie Ooshio (flagship) and 0-5 wildcards to 2-3 and get 6 S-ranks at the boss.
jp: オリョール海の制海権を確保せよ！
name: Secure Control of the Orel Sea
Sortie the flagship "Ooshio"
description: Sortie Ooshio (K2, flagship) to 3-5 and S-rank the boss.

name: Fleet, Third Anniversary
description: Sortie to 2-2 and 2-3 and get S-ranks at the bosses.

jp: 強行高速輸送部隊、出撃せよ！
name: Forced High-speed Transport Fleet, Sortie!
description: Sortie Sendai (K2, flag), Kawakaze (K2), Shigure (K2), 2 DDs and 0-1 wildcards to 4-1 and get an A-rank at the boss.

name: "1st Carrier Division", westward!
description: Sortie Akagi (flag), Kaga and 0-4 wildcards to 4-5 and S-rank the boss.

name: Sortie a Heavy Cruiser
description: Sortie a fleet with a CA flagship.

name: Sortie a Battleship
description: Sortie a fleet with a BB flagship.

name: Sortie a Carrier Task Force
description: Sortie a CV(L) (flagship), plus 5 CL/DD/AV.

name: Crush an Enemy Fleet
description: Defeat an enemy fleet.

name: Destroy the Main Force of the Enemy Fleet
jp: 敵艦隊主力を撃滅せよ！
description: Complete a battle.

name: Ambush the Enemy Fleet 10 times
description: Defeat 10 enemy fleets.

name: Sink 3 Enemy Carriers
description: Sink 3 enemy CV(L). Only available on dates ending in 3, 7 and 0.

name: Sink 3 Enemy Transport Ships
jp: 敵補給艦を3隻撃沈せよ！
description: Sink 3 Transport Ships.

name: Strike the Enemy Transport Group
description: Sink 5 Transport Ships. Only available on dates ending 2 or 8.

name: Seize Control of the Southwestern Achipelago Sea
jp: 南西諸島海域の制海権を握れ！
description: Defeat 5 bosses in world 2.

name: Suppress the Enemy Submarines
description: Sink 6 submarines.

name: Sortie the 5th Squadron
description: Sortie Myoukou, Nachi, Haguro and 3 additional ships to 2-5 and S-rank the boss.

name: Sortie the Submarine Fleet
description: Sortie to 6-1 and S-rank the boss 3 times.

name: Torpedo Squadron, southwards!
description: Sortie 1-3 CL (flagship), 3-5 DDs to 1-4 and S-rank the boss.

name: Surface Attack Fleet, to the South!
description: Sortie 3 BB(V)s, 1 CL and 2 additional ships to 5-1 and S-rank the boss.

name: Month-long Strengthening of the Marine Escort
description: Sortie to 1-5 and A-rank the boss 10 times.

name: Carrier Task Force, to the West!
description: Sortie 2 CV(L/B), 2 DD and 2 additional ships to 4-2 and S-rank the boss.

name: Send in the Surface Counterattack Fleet
description: Sortie 4 DDs (one as flagship), 1 CA (not CAV) and 1 CL to 2-5 and S-rank the boss.

name: Okinoshima Sea Counter Attack
description: Sortie to 2-4 and get 2 S-ranks at the boss.

name: Operation A-gou
description: Sortie 36 times, encounter 24 bosses, defeat 12 bosses and get 6 S-rank victories.

name: Strive to Ensure the Security of the Marine Transportation Route
jp: 海上輸送路の安全確保に努めよ！
description: Sortie to 1-5 and A-rank the boss 3 times.

name: Operation I-gou
description: Sink 20 CV(L).

name: Maritime Trade Disruption Operation
description: Sink 20 Transport Ships.

name: Operation Ro-gou
description: Sink 50 Transport Ships.

name: Marine Escort Battle
description: Sink 15 Submarines.

name: Destroy the Enemy's Eastern Fleet
jp: 敵東方艦隊を撃滅せよ！
description: Defeat 12 bosses in world 4.

name: Destroy the Main Force of the Enemy's Northern Fleet
jp: 敵北方艦隊主力を撃滅せよ！
description: Defeat 5 bosses in 3-3, 3-4, or 3-5.
Defeat the boss of 4-4.
jp: 敵東方中枢艦隊を撃破せよ！
name: Crush the Core of the Enemy's Eastern Fleet
Seize Air Superiority on the Southern Sea Coral Islands
jp: 南方海域珊瑚諸島沖の制空権を握れ！
description: Sortie to 5-2 and S-rank the boss twice.

name: The First Exercise
description: Complete a PvP match.

name: Increase the Level of Training by Exercising
description: Fight 3 PvP matches.

name: Overwhelm the other Admirals through Exercises
description: Win 5 PvP matches.

name: Large-scale Exercises
description: Win 20 PvP matches.

name: Strive the Increase the Level of the Fleet's Training
jp: 艦隊の練度向上に努めよ！
description: Win 3 PvP matches in the same day.

name: Continue Exercising, and Strive to Increase the Level of the Fleet's Training
jp: 演習を強化、艦隊の練度向上に努めよ！
description: Win 4 PvP matches in the same day.

name: Strive to Increase the Level of Training in Preparation for another Rush to the Northern Sea
jp: 北方再突入に備え、練度向上に努めよ！
description: Win 4 PvP matches in 1 day.

name: Elite Fleet Practice
description: Win 7 PvP matches in the same day.

name: Landing Force Practice
description: Win 4 PvP matches in the same day.

name: The First Expedition
description: Perform an Expedition

name: Enhance the use of Aviation Firepower
jp: 航空火力艦の運用を強化せよ！
description: Complete Expedition 23.

name: Continue Carrying Out the Rat Transportation to the South
jp: 南方への鼠輸送を継続実施せよ!
description: Perform Expedition 37/38 7 times.

name: (Continuation) Enhance the Use of Aviation Firepower
jp: (続)航空火力艦の運用を強化せよ！
description: Complete Expedition 23 four times.

name: Carry Out the Deep Sea Submarine Operations
jp: 遠洋潜水艦作戦を実施せよ！
description: Complete Expedition 39

name: Expand the Result of the Deep Sea Submarine Operations
jp: 遠洋潜水艦作戦の成果を拡大せよ！
description: Complete Expedition 39 twice.

name: Carry Out Air Defence Exercises
jp: 防空射撃演習を実施せよ！
description: Complete Expedition 6 three times.

name: Carry Out the Decoy Task Force Support Operation
jp: 囮機動部隊支援作戦を実施せよ！
description: Complete Expedition 15

name: Carry Out Naval Review Rehearsals
jp: 観艦式予行を実施せよ！
description: Complete Expedition 7 twice.

name: Execute Naval Review
description: Complete Expedition 8

name: Enhance the Use of the Task Force
jp: 機動部隊の運用を強化せよ！
description: Complete Expeditions 35 and 26.

name: Complete 3 Expeditions
description: Perform 3 expeditions.

name: Complete 10 Expeditions
description: Perform 10 expeditions.

name: Official Annoucement, Operation Large-scale Expedition
description: Perform 30 Expeditions.

name: The First Submarine Dispatch Operation
jp: 第一次潜水艦派遣作戦
description: Complete Expedition 30.

name: The Second Submarine Dispatch Operation
jp: 第二次潜水艦派遣作戦
description: Complete Expedition 30 (again).

name: Continue to Obtain Technology through Submarine Dispatch Operations
jp: 潜水艦派遣作戦による技術入手の継続
description: Complete Expedition 30 twice.

name: Operation Contact Foreign Ship through Submarine Dispatch
jp: 潜水艦派遣による海外艦との接触作戦
description: Complete Expedition 31.

name: Complete the Transport Operations towards South
jp: 南方への輸送作戦を成功させよ！
description: Complete Expedition 37 or 38

name: The First Resupply
description: Resupply a ship.

name: The First Repair
description: Repair a ship.

name: The Fleet's Large Maintenance
description: Repair 5 ships.

name: The Fleet's Canteen Festival
description: Perform 15 resupplies.

name: The First Construction
description: Craft a ship.

name: Prepare for Large Ship Construction (Part 2)
description: Scrap equipment 4 times.

name: Preparation for Transport Use Drum Canister
jp: 輸送用ドラム缶の準備
description: Scrap equipment 3 times.

name: Recycling Resources (Part 2)
description: Scrap equipment 24 times.

name: Model Conversion: Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Tomonaga Squadron)
description: Equip the flagship with an unlocked Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Tomonaga Squadron), then scrap 2 Tenzan.

name: Model Conversion: Type 99 Dive Bomber (Egusa Squadron)
description: Have a flagship equipped with an UNLOCKED Type 99 Dive Bomber (Egusa Squadron), then scrap 2 Suisei.

name: Model Conversion: Zero Fighter Type 52 Type C (601 Air Group)
description: Equip a flagship with an UNLOCKED Zero Fighter Type 52 C (601 Air Group), then scrap 2 Reppuu.

name: Preparation for Irako
description: Scrap equipment 10 times.

name: The First Equipment Improvement
description: Do equipment modernization 1 time.

name: Equipment Reinforcement
description: Perform equipment modernization once (failure is okay).

name: Model Conversion: Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron)
description: Equip Shoukaku (flagship) with an UNLOCKED Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron), then scrap 2 Tenzan.

name: The First Development
description: Craft a piece of equipment.

name: Organize the Elite Type 97 Torpedo Bomber Force
jp: 精鋭「九七式艦攻」部隊の編成
description: Have Shoukaku or Akagi as flagship, then scrap 3 Type 97 Torpedo Bombers.

name: Preparation of the Prototype Equipment
description: Scrap equipment 7 times.

name: Organize the New Elite Fighter Force
description: Have a Skilled Crew Member, equip a rank 7 Type 0 Fighter Model 21 on Houshou (secretary), then scrap 2 Type 0 Fighter Model 21 and 1 Type 96 Fighter.

name: Addition to Prototype Avaiation Equipment
jp: 試製航空艤装の追加試作
description: Scrap equipment 9 times.

name: Model Conversion: Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled)
description: Equip an UNLOCKED Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled) on a CV secretary, then scrap 2 Type 0 Fighter Model 52.

name: Model Conversion: Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled)
description: Equip a RANK 7 UNLOCKED Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled) on a CV secretary, then scrap 2 Type 0 Fighter Model 52.

name: Reorganize the Fighter Force: Type 0 Fighter Model 52 (Skilled)
description: Equip a RANK 7 UNLOCKED Type 0 Fighter Model 52 (Skilled) on Zuikaku (secretary), then scrap a Zero Fighter Model 52C (601 Air Group).

name: Model Conversion and Reorganization: Zero Fighter Model 52C (w/ Iwai Flight)
description: Equip a RANK 7 UNLOCKED Zero Fighter Model 52C (w/ Iwai Flight) on Zuikaku (secretary), then scrap 2 Type 0 Fighter Model 62 (Fighter-bomber).

name: Reorganize the Fighter Force: Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled)
description: Equip a rank 7 Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled) on Zuikaku (secretary), then scrap 2 Type 0 Fighter Model 21

name: Model Conversion: Zero Fighter Model 21 (w/ Iwamoto Flight)
description: Equip a rank 7 Zero Fighter Model 21 (w/ Iwamoto Flight) on Zuikaku (secretary), then scrap 2 Type 0 Fighter Model 52.

name: The First Dismantling
description: Scrap a ship.

name: Model Conversion and Reorganization: Zero Fighter Model 52A (w/ Iwamoto Flight)
description: Equip a RANK 7 UNLOCKED Zero Fighter Model 52A (w/ Iwamoto Flight) on Zuikaku (secretary), then scrap 2 Saiun.

name: Preparation for New Furniture
description: Scrap 9 pieces of equipment.
Scrap 5 pieces of equipment.
name: Preparations for the new Equipment

jp: 上陸戦用新装備の調達
name: Supply of the New Landing Force Equipment
description: Scrap 2 7.7mm Machine Guns and 2 12.7mm Machine Guns.

name: The First Scrapping
description: Scrap a piece of equipment.

name: Instructions to Develop New Equipment
description: Craft a piece of equipment (failure is okay).

name: Instructions to Construct a New Ship
description: Construct a ship.

name: Intensify the Concentration in Developing Equipment
description: Craft 3 pieces of equipment (failure is okay).

name: Strengthen the Fleet By Construction Shipgirls
description: Construct 3 ships.

name: Response to Disarmament Treaty
description: Scrap 2 ships.

name: The First Modernization
jp: はじめての「近代化改修」！
description: Perform a successful modernization.

name: Carry Out Ship Modernization
jp: 艦の「近代化改修」を実施せよ！
description: Perform 2 modernizations.

name: Proceed with Modernization and Prepare for War
jp: 「近代化改修」を進め、戦備を整えよ！
description: Perform 15 modernizations.

name: Preparation for Large Ship Construction (Part 1)
description: Perform 4 successful modernizations.

name: Preparation for the Ceremony (Part 3)
description: Have a level 90-99 flagship.

name: A New Voyage
description: Have a level 100 flagship and 5 other ships in your Main Fleet.

name: Preparation for the Ceremony (Final)
description: Get S Rank at the 2-3 boss with a level 90-99 flagship.

name: A Couple's First Quest
jp: 二人でする初めての任務！
description: S-rank the 4-3 boss with a level 100 flagship.

name: Preparation for the Ceremony (Part 2)
description: Win two battles in PvP.

name: Preparation for the Ceremony (Part 1)
description: Scrap equipment twice.
